episode.title: Live From WWDC 2018
episode.rawTitle: 223: Live From WWDC 2018 With Greg Joswiak and Mike Rockwell
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Recorded in front of a live audience at The California Theatre in San Jose, John Gruber is joined by Greg Joswiak and Mike Rockwell to discuss the news from WWDC: ARKit 2, the new USDZ file format, iOS 12, MacOS 10.14 “Mojave”, UIKit apps on MacOS, and more.
episode.showNotes:
Recorded in front of a live audience at The California Theatre in San Jose, John Gruber is joined by Greg Joswiak and Mike Rockwell to discuss the news from WWDC: ARKit 2, the new USDZ file format, iOS 12, MacOS 10.14 “Mojave”, UIKit apps on MacOS, and more. [Full transcript of this episode](https://daringfireball.net/thetalkshow/223/transcript), [by Serenity Caldwell](https://twitter.com/settern). Sponsored by: + [Instabug](http://try.instabug.com/df): In-app feedback and bug reporting for mobile apps. + [MacStadium](http://macstadium.com/df): Enterprise class hosting for Macs. + [Microsoft](http://aka.ms/iOSandAzure): Build intelligent iOS apps that scale. The open bar at the event was sponsored by [Setapp](https://setapp.com/). Links: + [Apple’s WWDC 2018 keynote](https://www.apple.com/apple-events/june-2018/).

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
